snippet: A Web video published by the gun rights group suggested that the president was an “elitist” because his two daughters have protection while he opposes posting armed guards at schools.
abstract: National Rifle Assn provokes furious response from White House by releasing video accusing Pres Obama of being an 'elitist' and a 'hypocrite' because he opposes posting armed guards at schools, while his daughters have Secret Service protection.
lead_paragraph: A Web video published by the gun rights group suggested that the president was an “elitist” because his two daughters have protection while he opposes posting armed guards at schools.

headline.main: White House Denounces Web Video by N.R.A.
headline.print_headline: White House Denounces Web Video By N.R.A.
